author: rooneg
msg: Fix issue #2030 (Errorful targets should be skipped, not end the entire
non-WC is now a warning instead of an error.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Pass commit test #28 (commit deletion of out-of-date file or dir) aka
Issue #1017.  We'll match ra_dav's behavior by sending a custom header on
(delete_entry): Update comment; call setup_delete_headers when we issue
the DELETE request; don't abort() on error.
message - which is identical to hudson_part_2's error message check.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Pass commit test #14 (hudson prob 2.1: move files, update empty dir)
by adding support for copied files.
(file_context_t): Store our copy_path and revision for the file if present.
(add_file): Store copy path and revision; don't abort on copies.
(close_file): Issue COPY request if we're the child of a copy; check correct

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Pass commit test #13 (hudson prob 2.0: prop commit on old dir fails).
(handle_checkout): Handle the case when we got an error gracefully.
(checkout_dir, checkout_file): Generate an error instead of abort()ing when
(get_version_url): New helper to fetch our checked-in URL for this resource
either from our local WC or from the server directly.
(open_root, open_dir): Use get_version_url to get our checked-in URL.
